introduction.p: The simpletest-support mailing-list is probably the most active area around SimpleTest : help, advice, bugs and workarounds tend to happen most of the time.

It's really
easy to subscribe and it's
fully searchable too.
At the last count, there were about 114 subscribers and 1908 message sent. That's anything between 1 and 4 messages per day on average.
